entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
